QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Blasted Lands!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Quartermaster Lungertz at Nethergarde Keep.$B$BNethergarde's garrison urgently needs your help to stem the Horde advance into the Blasted Lands! Travel south from the Swamp of Sorrows and follow the road east to reach Nethergarde Keep.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Quartermaster Lungertz at Nethergarde Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: For decades has the garrison at Nethergarde held firm against the threat of the Horde and we do not intend to surrender now.
